title: Muir's Tea Room
description: Vegan tea room set in a Victorian cottage, opened late-2014. Owner is inspired by John Muir, the naturalist who is a Scottish native. Offers daily high tea with finger sandwiches, pastries, and tea in the Scottish/English tradition. Full coffee bar plus breakfast and lunch items. An attached gift shop offers living floral arrangements and garden items, gourmet food, and children's gifts.
